title: Bug 117981: Unable to select items on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in library file.
2. Select the label item in library outline view.

Observed Behavior: I am unable to select the label item on the first attempt.
Expected Behavior: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.

Please note that on the second attempt, I am able to select the label item successfully.
